saveUserConfig() - Method in class shef.mt.enes.MainApp
 
Sentence - Class in shef.mt.features.util
Models a sentence as a span of text containing multiple information added by pre-processing tools
It provides direct access to well used features of a sentence, such as its text, tokens, ngrams, phrases, but also allows any tool to add information related to the sentence via the setValue() method.
